long_desc.thetext:
We added recently a storage lib which is self contained and could be published here: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/
The lib can be found in the 'component/storage' folder and contains a config which can build two different basic kinds of the lib. One job is named 'build' and builds the lib as standalone lib not relying on anything. The second job is named 'build-require' and builds a RequireJS compatible lib.

Both 'storage.js' and 'storage-require.js' are now built when publishing demos. It's very much aligned with the qx-oo downloads. I've also added links on the 'blue' index.html.
I've also tweaked storagelib/config.json, added a provisional 'source' job (just in case). I've removed the dependency logging from the normal 'build' and created a dedicated 'build-deps' that does a build with logging. Added some default jobs that make the component more standard; esp. 'distclean' is necessary for a well-behaved component (used in publishing).
